text: The St. Clair River () is a U.S. Geological Survey. National Hydrography Dataset high-resolution flowline data. The National Map , accessed November 7, 2011 river in central North America flows from Lake Huron into Lake St. Clair. It forms part of the international boundary between the Canadian province of Ontario and the U.S. state of Michigan. == References == Category:Rivers of Canada Category:Rivers of Michigan Category:Geography of Ontario
title: St. Clair River
